id.description: (STIX v2.0 required common property) A unique identifier for the identity.

type.description: (STIX v2.0 required) The type of object, 'identity' is type 'bundle'.

spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent the content in this Bundle.

id.description: A unique identifier for the course of action.

identity_class.description: The type of entity that this Identity describes, e.g., an individual or organization.

created.description: (STIX v2.0 optional common property) The date and time the identity was first created.

modified.description: (STIX v2.0 optional common property) The date and time this version of the identity was created.

name.description: (STIX v2.0 required) A string identifying the identity.

labels.description: (STIX v2.0 optional) The list of roles that this Identity performs

sectors.description: (STIX v2.0 optional) The list of industry sectors that this Identity belongs to.

contact_information.description: (STIX v2.0 optional) The contact information for this identity.
